did.unittitle: John Joseph Erratt Collection of NYU Memorabilia
did.abstract: John Joseph Erratt was an NYU alumnus. He graduated with a BA in 1952 and earned an Ed.D. in 1970. He worked at the University Bookstore when he was a student. The John Joseph Erratt Collection of NYU Memorabilia one pennant and two appliques from the 1950s.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The John Joseph Erratt Collection of NYU Memorabilia one pennant and two appliques from the 1950s.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by John Joseph Erratt were transferred to New York University in 2025 by John Erratt. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from repository. Please contact NYU Special Collections, special.collections@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by John Erratt, son of John Joseph Errat, in September 2025; the accession number associated with this gift is 2026.004.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; John Joseph Erratt Collection of NYU Memorabilia; MC 425; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: At the time of acquisition, textile materials were frozen as a preventative measure and cleaned. During accessioning, materials were rehoused in archival folders and boxes, and described on the collection-level.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: John Joseph Erratt was an NYU alumnus. He graduated with a BA in 1952 and earned an Ed.D. in 1970. He worked at the University Bookstore when he was a student.
